code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Popup from'./Popup';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NewCard(_ref){let{isOpen,onClose,onAddPlaceSubmit}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[link,setLink]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{if(!isOpen){setName('');setLink('');}},[isOpen]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAddPlaceSubmit({name,link});setName('');setLink('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Popup,{isOpen:isOpen,title:"Novo Local",name:"card",onClose:onClose,onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"formcard__input-title",id:"title-input",value:name,onChange:event=>setName(event.target.value),type:"text",name:"title",placeholder:"T\xEDtulo",minLength:2,maxLength:30,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"title-input-error",className:"formcard__input-title-error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"formcard__input-link",id:"url-input",value:link,onChange:event=>setLink(event.target.value),type:"url",name:"url",placeholder:"Link da imagem",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"url-input-error",className:"formcard__input-link-error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"formcard__submit",type:"submit",name:"card",children:"Criar"})]});}export default NewCard;
